name: Nomad Discovery Set
categories: Fragrance, Value & Gift Sets, Perfume Gift Sets
about: Set Description:Nestled in an orange box, these four travel-size, iconic HERMu00c8S fragrances invite you on an olfactory escape..About the Fragrance:The Parfums-Jardins collection brings together the soul of a placeu2014the perfumer's inspiration and the annual theme selected by the house. Enjoy an aromatic journey for every moment, satisfying your desire for freshness, reverie, and escape..This Set Contains:- 0.5 oz/ 15 mL Un Jardin u00e0 Cythere Eau de Toilette
ingredients: Un Jardin sur la Lagune : Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Hydroxycitronellal, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, BHT, Citral, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Benzoate.% alcool : 79% vol....Le Jardin de Monsieur Li : Alcohol, Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Limonene, Citronellol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, BHT, Linalool, Geraniol, Evernia Prunastri (Oakmoss) Extract..% alcool : 79 %...Un Jardins u00e0 Cythere : ALCOHOL  u2022  PARFUM  (FRAGRANCE)  u2022  AQUA  (WATER)  u2022BENZYL  SALICYLATE  u2022 LIMONENE  u2022  ALPHA-ISOMETHYL  IONONE  u2022  ETHYLHEXYL  SALICYLATE  u2022  BUTYL METHOXYDIBENZOYLMETHANE u2022 METHYL  ANTHRANILATEu2022LINALOOL u2022 COUMARIN u2022 CITRAL u2022 PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRA-DI-T-BUTYL  HYDROXYHYDROCINNAMATE  u2022  CITRONELLOL  u2022 HYDROXYCITRONELLAL u2022 GERANIOL u2022 BENZYL ALCOHOL u2022 TRIS(TETRAMETHYLHYDROXYPIPERIDINOL) CITRATE u2022 EUGENOL u2022 DISODIUM EDTA..% alcool : 79% vol....Un Jardin sur le Nil : Alcohol, Aqua (Water), Parfum (Fragrance), Limonene, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Hexyl Cinnamal, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Geraniol, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Citral..% alcool :  75% vol.
